content:
I hadn't read @brad_frost's (cool name) [article](http://bradfrost.com/blog/post/just/) about thoughtless use of the word "just" before seeing @adactio's [tweet](https://twitter.com/adactio/status/934078557302685696).

I'm sure I've used "just" in copy in that context before and I'll strive to avoid doing so in future.
